name: Spice-roasted Winter Vegetables
description: A great way to add more veggies to your seasonal diet.

ingredients.name: cubed, diced and peeled butternut squash
small onions
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cut in small wedges with stem end attached

preparation: Preheat oven to 450° F (230° C). Place rack in middle of oven.
Place all ingredients in centre of parchment-lined Sheet Pan. Using your fingers, toss vegetables to coat with Spices.
Spread vegetables evenly on pan. Do not crowd, or they will steam rather than roast.
Bake for 35 minutes, or until vegetables are tender and lightly browned.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.
